dcterms:description: Nr3D dataset contains 37,842 human-written sentences that refer to annotated objects in the 3D indoor scene dataset ScanNet. It includes 641 scenes with 511 for training and 130 for validation, covering 76 target object classes. The sentences are designed to refer to objects with multiple same-class distractors, and can be split into 'easy' and 'hard' subsets based on the number of distractors.
dcterms:title: Nr3D

dcterms:creator: Panos Achlioptas
Ahmed Abdelreheem
Fei Xia
Mohamed Elhoseiny
Leonidas Guibas
dcterms:description: Sr3D dataset is constructed using templates to automatically generate sentences that utilize spatial relations to distinguish objects of the same class. It has 1,018 training scenes and 255 validation scenes from ScanNet, totaling 83,570 sentences. The dataset can be split into 'easy' and 'hard' subsets similar to Nr3D.
dcterms:title: Sr3D

dcterms:creator: Dave Zhenyu Chen
Angel X Chang
Matthias Nie√üner
dcterms:description: ScanRefer dataset contains 51,583 human-written sentences for 800 scenes in ScanNet. The dataset is split into training and validation sets with 36,665 and 9,508 samples respectively. It can be divided into 'unique' and 'multiple' subsets based on whether the target object is a unique object class in the scene.
dcterms:title: ScanRefer
